SELECT "MAIN".MAIN_TYPE_IDX||')'||"SUB".SUB_TYPE_IDX||')'||"SUB".SUB_NAME||')'||"COSM_PROD".PROD_IDX||')'||"COSM_PROD".COSM_NAME||')'|| "COSM_PROD".PROD_INTRODUCE||')'||"COSM_PROD".PROD_INFOTYPE||')'||"KIND_PROD".CODE_OF_PROD||')'||"KIND_PROD".PROD_NAME ||')'||"PROD_IMG".NUM_OF_PROD_IDX||')'||"PROD_IMG".PATH_OF_IMAGE as data FROM COSMETIC_MAIN_TYPE_TB "MAIN" INNER JOIN COSMETIC_SUB_TYPE_TB "SUB" ON "MAIN".MAIN_TYPE_IDX = "SUB".MAIN_TYPE_IDX INNER JOIN COSMETIC_PRODUCT_TB "COSM_PROD" ON "SUB".SUB_TYPE_IDX = "COSM_PROD".SUB_TYPE_IDX INNER JOIN KINDS_OF_PRODUCT_TYPE_TB "KIND_PROD" ON "COSM_PROD".PROD_IDX = "KIND_PROD".PROD_IDX INNER JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE_PATH_TB "PROD_IMG" ON "KIND_PROD".CODE_OF_PROD = "PROD_IMG".CODE_OF_PROD WHERE "MAIN".MAIN_TYPE_IDX||')'||"SUB".SUB_TYPE_IDX||')'||"SUB".SUB_NAME||')'||"COSM_PROD".PROD_IDX||')'||"COSM_PROD".COSM_NAME||')'|| "COSM_PROD".PROD_INTRODUCE||')'||"COSM_PROD".PROD_INFOTYPE||')'||"KIND_PROD".CODE_OF_PROD||')'||"KIND_PROD".PROD_NAME ||')'||"PROD_IMG".NUM_OF_PROD_IDX||')'||"PROD_IMG".PATH_OF_IMAGE LIKE '%'|| #{productName} || '%'

SELECT prd.*,kprd.*,iprd.* FROM COSMETIC_PRODUCT_TB prd LEFT JOIN KINDS_OF_PRODUCT_TYPE_TB kprd ON prd.PROD_IDX=kprd.PROD_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE_PATH_TB iprd ON kprd.CODE_OF_PROD=iprd.CODE_OF_PROD WHERE prd.SUB_TYPE_IDX = #{subTypeIdx} ORDER BY prd.PROD_IDX ASC, kprd.CODE_OF_PROD ASC, iprd.NUM_OF_PROD_IDX ASC

SELECT prd.*,kprd.*,iprd.* FROM COSMETIC_PRODUCT_TB prd LEFT JOIN KINDS_OF_PRODUCT_TYPE_TB kprd ON prd.PROD_IDX=kprd.PROD_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE_PATH_TB iprd ON kprd.CODE_OF_PROD=iprd.CODE_OF_PROD WHERE prd.PROD_IDX = #{prodIdx} ORDER BY prd.PROD_IDX ASC, kprd.CODE_OF_PROD ASC, iprd.NUM_OF_PROD_IDX ASC
